about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hello! I'm a passionate Full-Stack Developer with a strong focus on creating innovative and efficient web solutions.
about.description: With expertise in modern web technologies and a deep interest in AI and Large Language Models, I build applications that combine cutting-edge technology with exceptional user experiences.
about.passion: I'm constantly learning and exploring new technologies to deliver the best solutions for my clients and projects.
